bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for a Metric Equipment Practice for Microcomputers-Coordination Document for Mezzanine Cards
IEEE Standard for a Metric Equipment Practice for Microcomputers-Coordination Document for Mezzanine Cards

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard establishes the metric modular order and coordination dimensions for mezzanine cards for use on host modules.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
